availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James C. Jones (Rockcastle County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Rockcastle County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah D. Jones. Father of Nancy Jones, Frances A. Jones, William B. Jones, Mary Jones, Margaret Jones, James M. Jones, and Robert C. Jones. Attorney in Rockcastle County in 1850 and 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, Northern District, p. 204; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, Mt. Vernon, p. 123; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, Mount Vernon, Voting District 1, p. 21; U.S. IRS Tax Assessment Lists, 1862-1918, Kentucky, 1863, Collection District 2, Division 14, p. 13.
